reduce_stress.description: Track factors that influence stress levels

educational_tips.tip: Stress hormones increase when you get less than 6 hours
Physical activity reduces cortisol by up to 40%
Even 10 minutes daily can lower anxiety levels
Too much caffeine can amplify stress response

better_sleep.description: Identify what helps you sleep better

educational_tips.tip: Caffeine stays in your system for 6-8 hours
Blue light before bed disrupts melatonin production
Regular exercise improves sleep quality by 65%
Alcohol may help you fall asleep but reduces sleep quality

understand_moods.description: Track patterns in your emotional state

educational_tips.tip: Social connection is a strong predictor of wellbeing
Writing helps process emotions and identify triggers
7-9 hours is optimal for energy and alertness
Movement increases energy even when you feel tired
20 minutes outside boosts energy and focus
Strategic caffeine use can help, but timing matters

manage_condition.description: Track triggers and helpful coping strategies

educational_tips.tip: Professional support provides tools for managing symptoms
Mindfulness reduces symptoms of anxiety and depression
Exercise is as effective as medication for mild-moderate depression
Sleep disruption is both a symptom and trigger
